items.title: Unlocking Blended Family Success (A Christian based course)

visible_instructors.job_title: Your highly-caffinated, relationship and parenting coach!
visible_instructors.name: Jed
visible_instructors.title: Jed Jurchenko

items.headline: Four keys to unlocking a happier, healthier, and holier blended family home!
objectives_summary: You will practice the keys to success with 131 creative conversation starters especially for blended family parents.
You will learn the four obstacles that all blended families face.
You will discover four, foundational keys to blended family success.

items.title: Energetic Uncoupling

visible_instructors.job_title: Wellness Expert, Energy Medicine Practitioner, Nutritionist
visible_instructors.name: Loa
visible_instructors.title: Loa Blasucci

items.headline: Don't Let Your Breakup Break You
objectives_summary: To understand and know the type of relationship you were in so you can identify which chakras are out of balance and need healing.
To cut the energetic cords that are still attached to your ex. You may not even realize this is happening.
Specific tools to call back the energy that's being siphoned off by your ex and depleting you perhaps without your knowing.

items.title: Daily Schedule and Time Management for parents
items.headline: For parents that want the best for their children
objectives_summary: The importance of order
What is a daily schedule?
Different types of a daily schedule

items.title: 3 Ways To Improve Any Relationship

items.headline: Your Relationships Can Always Get Better
objectives_summary: start building the relationship of their dreams
have tools to continue to build and improve their relationship
speak to each other in ways that foster more love

items.title: Recovery Program For Rebellious Teens
items.headline: Highly Structured Program That Follows Teen Miracle 1 & 2
objectives_summary: You will understand dynamic discipline based on the moral stage of your child and why this knowledge is absolutely essential in successful parenting, especially an out-of-control teen.
You will learn how to help your child progress through the 3 moral stages as their parent or guardian.
I will show you the exact and specific way to address “The Talk” with your teen to set the foundation for their recovery.

items.title: Parenting 101: Teaching Kids Financial Responsibility
items.headline: Build a Savings Tracking Sheet for Kids and Teens in Excel. Teach great savings and finance skills. Parenting Skills!
objectives_summary: Learn From A Top Rated Instructor Who Has Been Teaching On Udemy Since 2013 and Taught Over 100,000 Students!
Template Download: Download The Template From The Course At The End
Create A Simple and Effective Cash Tracking Spreadsheet

items.headline: Hundreds of tips, prints outs and games to help your little piano, flute, violin, cello or guitar player to practice
objectives_summary: No more fighting/bribing/nagging to get your child to practice making music
Better understand what to do to form the practicing habit
Have a collection of games to use to make music practice fun

items.title: How to teach your kids using only GAMES on your mobile
items.headline: Enable your kids to learn core subjects from the games they play on your mobile while they enjoy the procedure.
objectives_summary: How to make your kids study only by playing games
How to raise children to love algebra, math, programming, languages, etc.
How to pass information to your children in modern ways

items.title: Secrets of Great Relationships
items.headline: A Guide for Couples in Experiencing Wholeness and Achieving a Happy and Fulfilling Life.
objectives_summary: Understand the varying Stages of Relationships.
Learn the correlation between Needs and optimal relationships.
Identify successful practices of Conscious Combat and Responsibility.

items.title: Raising Drug and Alcohol Free Kids

visible_instructors.title: Denise Roberts

items.headline: Harm reduction approach; research and evidence based parenting techniques that will prevent your child from addiction
objectives_summary: You will learn how to implement certain techniques to give their children the best chance at being drug and alcohol free.
How to raise drug and alcohol free kids.
You will learn how your own childhood may affect your outlook on drugs and alcohol.

items.title: How To Maintain Your Identity in a Relationship

visible_instructors.job_title: Founder of the Kane Intentional Communication Institute
visible_instructors.name: Cynthia
visible_instructors.title: Cynthia Kane

items.headline: Techniques for taking care of yourself in a relationship
objectives_summary: Understand how to maintain your identity within a relationship, spot when you are losing your identity within a relationship, learn techniques to maintain your identity within a relationship

items.title: Mindfulness for Parents with MRS JOY
items.headline: Discover in this audio course how to bring mindfulness to your life and to promote more wellbeing for your whole family!
objectives_summary: Mindfulness For Parents is designed to support you to discover what is Mindfulness and how it can help you and your whole family to increase wellbeing.
The Secrets of The 3 Pillars of Mindfulness and how these self-regulation tools can help you and your kids to reduce stress, anxiety and depression.
You will also learn how to bring Mindfulness into your daily routine and how it can be a fun activity for you to play with your children and your whole family.

items.title: Mastering Relationships: Communication, Conflict, and Caring
items.headline: How to use your communication, conflict and caring styles to improve personal and work relationships
objectives_summary: Distinguish different communication styles and their strengths and limitations.
Distinguish different conflict management styles and their strengths and limitations
Distinguish different styles of caring and supporting others and their strengths and limitations.

items.title: How to stop your child being bullied
items.headline: A guide for parents of children between the age of 4 and 12 that are affected by bullying
objectives_summary: How to stop your child being bullied
Parents and carers will be able to identify what bullying is and is not and understand how it affects their child.
How to stop bullying in school

items.title: Learn 199 Ways of Parenting
items.headline: Learn to be a WOW PARENT!
objectives_summary: Takers of this course are expected to be a QUALITY Parent!

items.title: Identifying Manipulation in Interpersonal Relationships
items.headline: This course will teach you how to identify manipulation and deceit in communication
objectives_summary: After this course, students will be have answers about their previous toxic relationships.
After this course, students will understand how to identify and even predict manipulative behaviors.
After this course, students will have the knowledge to be more assertive in order to avoid and even escape toxic relationships.
